text:
It may be useful to skip abstract test cases automatically when using a junit
batchtest task. Currently these tests have to be explicitely excluded in the
usefulfileset.
creator: ebourg@apache.org
stevel@apache.org
text:
I see your point, but think this is probably a junit feature as Ant cannot tell
which classes are abstract; it just looks at filenames.

creator: ebourg@apache.org

text: Resolved under revision revision 1523198 with the addition of a 'skipNonTests' attribute to the test and batchtest tasks.
creator: mclarke@apache.org
